overview_of_class: This course attempts to untangle the numerous movements and upheavals that have come to characterize the 1960s and examine their historical consequences. It asks why and how this period witnessed the mobilization of an incredible variety of people and impulses?dirty language, sex, drugs, rock n' roll, racial unrest, renewed feminism, religious transformations, tumultuous politics, violent protests, and much more. We will deal with questions concerning when "the sixties" began and ended and how the legacies of that period manifested in the decades that followed.
name: The Sixties
title: WCAS HISTORY 316-0-26 The Sixties
